str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From para and lambano; to receive near, i.e. Associate with oneself; by analogy, to assume an office; figuratively, to learn.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A witness (judicially) or figuratively (genitive case); by analogy, a 'martyr'.
